sources.title: Thursday's Child
sources.description: Title: Thursday's Child Summary: Family tensions arise when a schoolgirl becomes a successful child actor. Directed by: Rodney Ackland Actors: Sally Ann Howes, Wilfrid Lawson, Kathleen O Production Company: Associated British Picture Corporation (ABPC) Release Date: 16 August 1943 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Family tensions arise when a schoolgirl becomes a successful child actor.

metadata.Plot: Family tensions arise after a schoolgirl becomes a successful child actor.
metadata.Actors: Sally Ann Howes, Wilfrid Lawson, Kathleen O'Regan
